channel.title: Postgresql on Sylvain Verly
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on Sylvain Verly

item.title: PostgreSQL Salesforce ID extension
item.description: The plugin helps database administrators who use PostgreSQL and Salesforce IDS in their database to have a more efficient internal representation that helps reduce space and time to compute comparison between two ids as opposed to using a text type. Github project Dev stack: PostgreSQL, PostgreSQL extension, C++

item.title: Nuodata
item.description: I founded Nuodata.io: a SaaS platform and open source open source project. It is based on PostgreSQL and Node.js. I am responsible for the development and the architecture of the project. nuodata-db-api nuodata-server http://nuodata.io The goal is to use tables and views as your API endpoints, for CRUD operations. The goal is to shift a lot of development to the database to save time and have a more reliable data and system.
